entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
